name: Hentai Asmodeus
summary: 10 year ago, five Demon Lords have been sealed into five Saintess. The Saintess disappeared after that. An adventurer finds the Saintess and defeats them to get Demon’s power to save his life. Let’s conquer all Saintess by cutting their Narutal Power!
info:
• 中文名: 绅士大魔王
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Ero
  • 游戏制作: Hega Studio
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019-10-24
